General.Name: First Steamship Co Ltd
General.Description: First Steamship Co., Ltd. operates as a shipping company in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It engages in dry bulk carrier operations that include the transportation of various bulk materials comprising iron ores, coal, grains, and other dry bulk cargoes. The company also offers vessel management, shipping agency, international transportation, and vessel leasing services; crewing services, such as crewmember recruitment, selection, and training; and automobile financial leasing and business consultation services. It owns and operates vessels, including kamsarmax, lightweight, and supramax vessels. In addition, the company operates department stores that sell apparel, jewelry, cosmetics, shoes, sporting goods, home appliances, and others; and trades in cosmetics, furnishings, etc. Further, it is involved in the leasing of commercial real estate, as well as setting up department store floor space for brand operators and end consumers; real estate development activities; rental and leasing of buildings; and management consulting business. First Steamship Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1963 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 237, Fuhsing South Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106
